text: Ali Baba is an Indian fantasy television series produced by Peninsula Pictures. It premiered on 22 August 2022 on SAB TV, and stars Sheezan Mohammed Khan and Tunisha Sharma in the titular lead role. == Plot == The series follows the life of an orphan Alibaba, from the Mamuli Gali of Kabul, and the challenges he faces while he tries to protect and take care of five other orphan children. ==Cast== * Sheezan Mohammed Khan as Ali Baba, Shehzaadi Mariam's love interest. * Tunisha Sharma as Shehzaadi Mariam, princess of Kabul, Sultan's daughter, Ali Baba's love interest. * Karthik Jayaram as Iblis, leader of 40 thieves, Simsim's love interest and a dreadful and deadly warrior. * Sayantani Ghosh as Simsim, devotee of Iblis and later become guardian of the Cave. Iblis love interest. == References == == Other websites == * Ali Baba Dastaan – E – Kabul on Sony SAB Category:Fantasy television series Category:Hindi-language television series Category:2020s Indian television series Category:2022 Indian television series debuts Category:2023 Indian television series endings
title: Ali Baba (TV series)
